sourcesContent:
import classes from "./DisplayMovie.module.css"; import DisplayCard from "./DisplayCard"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {addToFavorites, isAlreadyFavorite} from "./addToFavorites"; function DisplayMovie(props) { return (

episode: {props.movie.episode_id}

Star Wars: {props.movie.title}

opening crawl:
{props.movie.opening_crawl}

release date: {props.movie.release_date}

producer: {props.movie.producer}

directed by: {props.movie.director}

characters:

    {props.movie.characters.map(character =>
  • {character.name}
    • )}

Planets:

    {props.movie.planets.map(planet =>
  • {planet.name}
    • )}

Vehicles:

    {props.movie.vehicles.map(vehicle =>
  • {vehicle.name}
    • )}
) } export default DisplayMovie;
